name: Grafic final project
body:
###  AUTHOR: Sara Vagnarelli
###  MATRICOLA: 431816
### SUBJECT: **GRAPHIC PROJECT**
### ACCADEMIC YEAR: 2012/2013



### The following job concerns in the 3D realization of fashion interior design objects:

### PRADA'S PRODUCTIONS
* PRADA'S HIGH-HEELED SHOES
* PRADA’S BALLERINAS


### IKEA'S PRODUCTIONS
* SHOE RACK
* STOOL



                                   
**PRADA fashion label PRODUCTIONS**


_Prada_ S.p.A. is an Italian fashion label specializing in luxury goods for men and women (ready-to-wear, leather and fashion accessories, shoes, luggage.
The company was founded in 1913 by Mario Prada and it has become one of the most famous societies in the word thank's to it's original design an creativity.
Additionally fashion has often dictated many design elements, such as whether shoes have very high heels or flat ones SUCH AS: PRADA’S HIGH-HEELED SHOES AND PRADA’S BALLERINES

![prada](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/prada%20negozio.jpg)



**PRADA’S BALLERINAS**
These ballerina flats are the essential accessory for any girl on the go who constantly needs to swap her heels for a comfy alternative. 
Whether it’s to console your feet after a long night of partying or simply a shopping trip you can’t face in heels the Butterfly Twists ballerina shoes are the perfect comfortable compliment.
The ballerina flats are brilliant for driving around town safely, commuting to work in style and traveling in complete comfort these stylish multi-purpose ballerina shoes are ideal no matter what the occasion!


_In order to obtain a 3D model of the following picture some steps have been made_:

**original picture**
![ballerina](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/foto/fotoballerine.png)

**screenshots of the 3D model**

First of all, the base has been modelled in various colors : e.g **green** and **blue**

![base](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/ballerine%20senza%20fiocco.png)

Than has been added the bow detail

![bow](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/fiocco.png)

In the end the 3D model of the original picture has been obtained as below:

![ballerine finali](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/screenshot/ballerine.png)


* **PRADA'S HIGH-HEELED SHOES**
A shoe is an item of footwear intended to protect and comfort the human foot while doing various activities. Shoes are also used as an item of decoration. The design of shoes has varied enormously through time and from culture to culture, with appearance originally being tied to function. 


_In order to obtain a 3D model of the following picture some steps have been made_:

**original picture**

![tacco](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/foto/fototacco.png)

**screenshots of the 3D model**



First of all, the base has been modelled , curing the **cleat** of the shoes, the **curved shape** and the **different coloured sole**

![high](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/tacco.png)

Than it has been added the rose detail

![rosa](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/rosa.png)

In the end the 3D model of the original picture has been obtained as below:

![fin](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/screenshot/tacco.png)






**IKEAS PRODUCTIONS**

IKEA (Swedish pronunciation IPA) is a privately held, Dutch company with Swedish origins, that designs and sells ready-to-assemble furniture (such as beds, chairs, and desks), appliances, and home accessories. The company is the world's largest furniture retailer. Founded in Sweden in 1943 by 17-year-old Ingvar Kamprad, who later became one of the richest people in the world, the company's name is an acronym comprising the initials of Ingvar Kamprad, Elmtaryd (the farm where he grew up) and Agunnaryd (his hometown in Småland, South Sweden). The company is known for its modern architectural designs on various types of appliances and furniture, often associated with a simplified eco-friendly interior design.

![fondatore ikea](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/images.jpg)



**IKEA'S SHOE RACK**


_In order to obtain a 3D model of the following picture some steps have been made_:

**original picture**

![scarpiera](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/foto/fotoscarpiera.png)


**screenshots of the 3D model**

First of all, the empty shoe rack has been modelled

![scarpiera vuota](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/scarpiera1.png)

Than has been added the shoes, one by one, this has been on of the majour diifficulties

![sc](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/scarpiera2.png)

![prova](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/scarpiera3.png)

In the end the 3D model of the original picture has been obtained as below:

![finale](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/screenshot/scarpiera.png)




**IKEA'S STOOL**



_In order to obtain a 3D model of the following picture some steps have been made_:

**original picture**

![sgabello](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/foto/fotosgabello.png)

**screenshots of the 3D model**

First of all, the **seat** of stool has been modelled.
Than has been added the base and its relating details 

![dxd](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/steps/sgabello.png)

In the end has been obtained the final 3D model of the original picture shown below:

![dd](https://raw.github.com/saravgn/saravgn.github.io/master/screenshot/sgabello.png)
